DOC.brief_summary: Various methods of FDG-PET signal segmentation will be validated by correlation of histopathologically measured tumor dimensions in lymph node dissection specimens of head-and-neck cancer patients.
DOC.brief_title: Validation of FDG-PET Segmentation Tools for Tumor Delineation by Correlation of CT- and FDG-PET Volume Measurements With Histopathology of Nodal Metastases of Head and Neck Carcinomas.
DOC.criteria: All patients with N+ squamous cell carcinoma of the head and neck, planned for neck dissection. Age >18 years. Pregnancy. Women breast feeding
